resources.string:
Do what you love and
love what you do.
Find and chase your passion,
you never stop to look for it
because to live you need passion.

Set your goals, pursue it and
commit to excellence.
Be proud of every step you take
toward reaching that goal.

Men come and go, ideas remain
and continue to walk
on the legs of others.
Share your ideas with other people
and make something new.

Always strive to improve yourself.
Read, learn and educate
yourself every day
for the coming conflicts.

You need to persist through time,
failure, mistakes,
criticism and adversity.
Just keep going and never give up.
